title: Investigation of Zur-regulated metal transport systems reveals an unexpected role of pyochelin in zinc homeostasis.
authors: Secli V, Michetti E, Pacello F, Iacovelli F, Falconi M, Astolfi ML, Visaggio D, Visca P, Ammendola S, Battistoni A
abstract: Limiting the availability of transition metals at infection sites serves as a critical defense mechanism employed by the innate immune system to combat microbial infections. The mechanisms underlying the remarkable ability of
